alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 7:18PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Evangeline, southern Avoyelles and north central St. Landry Parishes through 800 PM CST... At 718 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Indian Lake, or 8 miles west of Morrow, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bunkie, Simmesport, Moreauville, Bordelonville, Morrow, Cottonport, Evergreen, Plaucheville, Goudeau, Indian Lake, Chicot State Park, Whiteville, Big Cane, Dupont, Big Bend, St. Landry and Hamburg. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 39 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
